description:
It has a bit of a learning curve, but with osnc charts, a touchscreen on my raspberry and my pc, it works perfect.

some things could be a bit more intuitive in the interface.

I've been using openCPN since 2004. It's hands down the best supported, and has the most DIY interfaces of any program I've seen. I use it to operate my radar, AIS, autopilot, GRIB weather, weather fax, and navigation. It connects to my wifi network and displays all of my sailing instrument data. It's my go source for situational awareness
apreciate for this software, it can be helpfull for navigatio software
... and it seems to be maintained upstream. This version has some 20 plugins including oesenc availablle from within the application which is what I use being non-US.
Linux version has fataly crashed once but i am running a lot of charts and waypoints.
summary: 5.8.0 with OSenc is fast and fantastic on Fedora 37

description: was real easy to add satelite overlays to the areas we were planning to anchor at
I may have a corrupt config. Using mbtiles feature and heavily adding saftey waypoints. Before the flatpak fails a crash, there is no
summary: 5.8.2-1 draws route right accoss the page

description: Hab noch nicht alle Funktionen gestestet, sieht aber gut aus.

Das GUI ist etwas gewöhnungsbedürftig, man findet aber letztlich alles. 

Durch die Plugins weiterer Autoren viele viele Zusatzfunktionen und inzwischen als eines der wenigen Navi-Systeme auf freien Rechnern offiziel als elektronisches Seekartendisplay zugelassen.

Läuft stabil und schnell auf meinem Android-Handy, meinem Linux-Laptop und meinem Windos-Navi-Tablet. 

Überall alles gleich konfiguriert. Egal was ausfällt, es geht immer weiter.
summary: Kann schon extrem viel und wird immer besser

description: Bonne application de carto marine, dommage que les plugins manquent à la version linux. Intégration grib nickel.
Been using it for years, really llike it. I have a radar ans AIS interface, all works good.
